00001 #ifndef _222CUBE_H
00002 #define _222CUBE_H
00003 
00004 #include <stdint.h>
00005 #include <stdio.h>
00006 
00007 /*********************
00008  *
00009  * 2x2x2 cube representation
00010  *
00011  * for Explorer
00012  *
00013  * by Michal Hordecki
00014  *
00015  *********************/
00016 
00017 /************
00018  * Cube representation structure:
00019  *
00020  * There are 5 bits, at different positions, dedicated to each position on the 2x2x2.
00021  * For each position, there are 2 pieces of information stored:
00022  *
00023  * - Which cubie is in this position? (1 of 8 = 3 bits)
00024  * - What's the orientation of this cubie? (1 of 3 = 2 bits)
00025  *
00026  * Which totals in 5 bit each and 40 for the whole cube.
00027  * In each such group orientation info comes first.
00028  *
00029  * First criterion is probably self explanatory (see #defs below), but for
00030  * second I think there should be some kind of clarifying:
00031  * 
00032  * Corner orientation can be one of these three types:
00033  *
00034  * 0 - facing U/D face
00035  * 1 - facing F/B face
00036  * 2 - facing R/L face
00037  *
00038  * 
00039  *
00040  */
00041 
00042 //Corner offsets
00043 #define UFR 0
00044 #define URB 5
00045 #define UBL 10
00046 #define ULF 15
00047 
00048 #define DRF 20
00049 #define DFL 25
00050 #define DLB 30
00051 #define DBR 35
00052 
00053 // Cubies
00054 #define CUFR 0
00055 #define CURB 1
00056 #define CUBL 3
00057 #define CULF 2
00058 
00059 #define CDRF 4
00060 #define CDFL 6
00061 #define CDLB 7
00062 #define CDBR 5
00063 
00064 //Orientations
00065 #define orientUD 0LL
00066 #define orientFB 1LL
00067 #define orientRL 2LL
00068 
00069 namespace Explorer

00079 
00091                         void set(int slot, uint64_t cubie, uint64_t orient);
00092 
00093 
00099                         void strip();
00100 
00101         };
00102 
00103         typedef Cube (*MovePtr)(const Cube&);
00104 
00109         struct Move
00110         {
00112                 MovePtr fun;
00113 
00114                 // Name of the move.
00115                 const char *name;
00116 
00117                 // Internal use
00118                 int index;
00119         };
00120
